Name: An inconsequential choice
Description: You are thirsty and are dying for a drink. There are two off licenses to choose from. Which do you fancy?

EventOptions.Description: The one with the guy who is always starting at the TV.
The where you always feel like you are being watched.

Name: An unfortunate result
Description: You are murdered to death and kind of regret it.

Name: That went ok
Description: You buy your booze and live a happy and contented life. You cant help but feel that choice was more important that it appeared.
